channel.title: Posts on Greg Davill's Projects
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Greg Davill's Projects

item.title: Dell XPS13 RAM Upgrade (7390)
item.description: I’d recently bought a new XPS13 7390 (non 2-in-1) laptop. I had bought the 8GB variant, how hard could it be to upgrade?

item.title: Boson Frame Grabber Part 6
item.description:
Still alive? ðŸª¦

Yes, it’s true this project did get dropped for awhile, it’s been about 3 years since the last blog post.

item.title: Boson Frame Grabber Part 5
item.description: Details about the SoC architecture in the Boson Frame Grabber

item.title: Boson Frame Grabber Part 4
item.description: The new hardware for the Boson Frame Grabber will be based around the Lattice ECP5 family. Lattice make available a free IDE for this FPGA assuming you are not using a model with embedded SERDES. Since we are not, it’s perfect for our application.

item.title: Boson Frame Grabber Part 3
item.description: In this part I want to talk about the firmware, or code, this device will need in order to operate as I want.

item.title: Boson Frame Grabber Part 2
item.description: In part 1, I discussed the version 1 prototype I had built. Just after ordering the PCBs for that project I decided to start thinking about miniaturizing the hardware.

item.title: Boson Frame Grabber Part 1
item.description: Designing a thermal camera with the boson
